readable.title: 3134341610_3c55e373a7
readable.content: A man and woman in masks and costume make a toast in front of a christmas tree . A woman in mask sits next to a man wearing a Santa suit and also in mask as they hold wine glasses next to a Christmas tree . Santa and a woman drink wine next to the christmas tree while wearing joke disguise glasses . Two people , one of whom is in a Santa costume , pose wearing funny glasses . Two people with silly disguises at Christmas time
